AirWobbling.NAME: Air Wobbling
AirWobbling.FLAVOR: Falcon's OP and wobbles you into a Rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAerial cards that add #yCombo-Points add one additional #yCombo-Point.

AutoLCanceling.NAME: Auto L Canceling
AutoLCanceling.FLAVOR: Everyone misses them, sometimes it's nice to turn it on.
DESCRIPTIONS: After using an Aerial, reduce the cost of your next card by 1 [E] if it's a non-Aerial.

B0XX.NAME: B0XX
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, remove all Jabs. Receive 5 Shines.

BMoveUser.NAME: B Move User
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Burn, apply an additional 1 Burn.

FourStock.NAME: Four Stock
DESCRIPTIONS: When a battle is finished without taking damage, upgrade a card.

LosersMang0.NAME: Team Beer Mang0
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain -1 Strength and -1 Dexterity. If you die and resurrect, at the start of combat, gain +4 Strength and +4 Dexterity

NoKnee.NAME: No Knee
DESCRIPTIONS: When a Finisher is used on a target that has Combo-points, gain 2 Strength.

PeoplesChamp.NAME: People's Champ
PeoplesChamp.FLAVOR: I lost to Scarth in bracket at The Big House 6, my shame is immeasurable.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 6 turns, add a Commentator Curse that can change the intent of the target to your hand.

PowerClipper.NAME: Power Clipper
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 10 turns, replay the cards you played this turn.

PurpleSkull.NAME: Purple Skull
PurpleSkull.FLAVOR: A small skull imbued with chaotic power.
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have #b
or more stacks of #yWeak, #yVulnerable, or #yFrail, gain #b
#yDexterity

GhostlyHand.NAME: Ghostly Hand
GhostlyHand.FLAVOR: Phases in and out of existence. Cool to the touch.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an #yEthereal card enters your Exhaust Pile, gain #b
HP.

AstralEgg.NAME: Astral Egg
AstralEgg.FLAVOR: The egg of an interdimensional leviathan. Best to not let it hatch.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add an #yEthereal card to your deck, it is #yUpgraded

MechanicalCore.NAME: Mechanical Core
MechanicalCore.FLAVOR: The still powered core of a destroyed mechanical beast. Its shields still are somewhat working.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yArtifact.

PowerCells.NAME: Power Cells
PowerCells.FLAVOR: It's always good to keep some spare charge around. You'll never know when you may need it.
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of each combat, gain #b
energy and draw #b
additional cards. The cards in your hand at the beginning of combat are #yEthereal

PaperPengwin.NAME: Paper Pengwin
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are #yFrail, #yWeak, or #yVulnerable, gain #b
#yStrength and #b
#yDexterity.

SolarEgg.NAME: Solar Egg
SolarEgg.FLAVOR: An egg-shaped meteorite that fell from the sun. It glows warmly.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add an #yEthereal card to your deck, it is #yUpgraded

RodOfNegation.NAME: Rod of Negation
RodOfNegation.FLAVOR: Imbued with chaotic power, this rod emits a ghastly purple glow on those around it.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may discard #b1 card from your starting hand to gain #b1 #yArtifact.

Blueberries.NAME: Blueberries
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
max HP for each #yEthereal card in your deck.

CosmicSieve.NAME: Cosmic Sieve
CosmicSieve.FLAVOR: Phases in and out of existence. Cool to the touch.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an #yEthereal card enters your Exhaust Pile, heal #b
HP.

Telescope.NAME: Telescope
Telescope.FLAVOR: With this telescope, one can see further than ever before.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose any number of cards in your starting hand to gain #yEthereal.
